name: Robert Jarvik
description:
How does it feel to be married to one of the smartest women in the world? You won't win any arguments, that's for sure... (Although, that is probably the case when married to any woman, regardless of intellect.)

Why not ask Robert Jarvik? His wife is Marilyn vos Savant, who had the highest recorded IQ on record. Of course, vos Savant parlayed that into a gig in Parade Magazine, which is not exactly the best use of your brain power. No offense, Parade readers.

Jarvik is not exactly a slouch himself. (If his last name sounds familiar, he is the nephew of recently-profiled Murray Jarvik.) What is he known for? Well, inventing the first artificial heart, the Jarvik-7!

How does it feel to be married to one of the smartest men in the world? Why not ask Marilyn vos Savant...
